origins.name: Demon
origins.desc: Demon basic attacks have a 40% chance to burn 20 mana from their target and return some mana to the attacker.

origins.name: Glacial
origins.desc: Glacial attacks gain a chance to stun enemies for 1.5s

origins.name: Hextech
origins.desc: When combat begins, the ally team launches and detonates a pulse bomb, temporarily disabling nearby enemy items for 5 seconds.

origins.name: Ninja
origins.desc: The Ninja Trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or all 4 Ninjas.

origins.name: Wild
origins.desc: Attacks generate stacks of Fury (stacks up to 5 times). Each stack of Fury gives 10% Attack Speed

origins.name: Yordle
origins.desc: Yordles gain a chance to dodge enemy attacks

classes.name: Assassin
classes.desc: Innate: At the start of combat Assassins leap to the farthest enemy. Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage.

classes.name: Blademaster
classes.desc: Blademaster attacks have a 45% chance to trigger additional attacks on-hit

classes.name: Elementalist
classes.desc: Innate: Elementalists gain double mana from attacks

classes.name: Gunslinger
classes.desc: Gunslinger attacks gain a 50% chance to trigger additional attacks on-hit

classes.name: Ranger
classes.desc: Rangers gain a chance to double their attack speed every 3s for the next 3s

classes.name: Shapeshifter
classes.desc: Shapeshifters gain bonus maximum Health when they transform

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.desc: Innate: Sorcerers gain double mana from attacks. All Allies have increased Spell Power
